column2: Add "delete unversioned" action shortcut in commit changes dialog

column3: Actually, I think, it's not quite OK to add "DELETE" shortcut to the "ChangesView.DeleteUnversioned" action, because it is enabled "almost everywhere" and will highly intersect with common "$Delete" action (though the implementation is quite the same).
I'll make changes to use "$Delete" action instead of "ChangesView.DeleteUnversioned" (and so delete shortcut will also be available).
If I've understood you correctly, I need to edit VcsActions.xml only.

If I do that, then I the delete icon disappears from the context menu.
Will it be ok?
Otherwise it works on both Linux and macOs, thanks for the tip.
I've pushed several changes related to the topic - see 023f55d, 9bae28b, 7627ae1, c4f3bd9.
Great, thanks a lot for the fix.
Add explicit shortcut set to support macOs backspace shortcut.
